results.title: Effects of adrenaline in human colon adenocarcinoma HT-29 cells.
results.text_hl: The stimulatory action of @CHEMICAL_Epinephrine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004837 @@@adrenaline@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Colorectal_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015179 @@@colon cancer@@@ growth was blocked by @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_ICI_118551 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C026777 @@@ICI 118,551@@@, a @GENE_BBS9 @GENE_27241 @@@beta(1)@@@- and @GENE_IGKV5_2 @GENE_28907 @@@beta(2)@@@-selective antagonist, respectively.

citations.NLM: Wong HP, Ho JW, Koo MW, Yu L, Wu WK, Lam EK, Tai EK, Ko JK, Shin VY, Chu KM, Cho CH. Effects of adrenaline in human colon adenocarcinoma HT-29 cells. Life Sci. 2011 Jun 20;88(25-26):1108-12. PMID: 21565206
